merpi_desc: %USER's feline muzzle. It sure is a face of all time. Maybe you should...?

merpi_flowery: %USER pulls their head back for a moment before slamming their feline muzzle into %TARGET's %T_PART violently!!
%USER presses their feline muzzle close to %TARGET's %T_PART, nuzzling and showing desire.

merpi_normal: %USER rubs their feline muzzle warmly against %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER presses their feline muzzle in close to %TARGET's %T_PART, warmly and lovingly pressing it to themselves.

merpi_normal: %USER pushes their feline muzzle to %TARGET's %T_PART, letting them feel how heated it is.
merpi_flowery: %USER rubs their feline muzzle against %TARGET's %T_PART, the clear warmth radiating from it should make it clear that they're either in heat, or deeply desire %TARGET!

merpi_normal: %USER affectionately presses their feline muzzle to %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER rubs lovingly against %TARGET's %T_PART with their feline muzzle, obviously showing them deep amounts of love and affection.

merpi_normal: %USER smacks %TARGET's %T_PART to their feline muzzle playfully.
merpi_flowery: %USER very gently headbutts %TARGET's %T_PART, it's a playful motion but also more than a bit needy as they don't pull away after connecting while seeming a bit flushed!

merpi_normal: %USER presses %TARGET's %T_PART firmly to their feline muzzle!
merpi_flowery: %USER holds their feline muzzle still against %TARGET's %T_PART, savoring the moment between the two in full.
merpi_repeat: %USER pushes their feline muzzle to %TARGET's %T_PART with love!

merpi_normal: %USER smushes %TARGET's %T_PART to their feline muzzle a bit too hard!
merpi_flowery: %USER seems to lose control of their senses a bit, warmth radiating from their feline muzzle as it gets near %TARGET's %T_PART!
%USER rests their feline muzzle so gently on %TARGET's %T_PART that it seems they don't even want to move, reveling in the closeness of the other person.
